0.title: Bytes Received
0.query:
timeseries avg(dt.process.network.bytes_rx), by: { dt.entity.process_group_instance }, 
filter:dt.entity.process_group_instance in [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd process.network.bytes_rx = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.process.network.bytes_rx)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.process_group_instance, "entity.name")
| sort process.network.bytes_rx desc
| limit 20

| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.process_group_instance, "entity.name")
| sort process.network.bytes_tx desc
